/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, teeming with life, stretches out below, flanked by towering buildings and lush green trees. Cars and pedestrians animate the scene, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The image is bathed in the warm glow of daylight, highlighting the vibrant colors and intricate details of the cityscape.
